name: PROJECT TRUNK
description:
Play as a TRUNKMAN! Will you be able to navigate the critter-filled BEAK FOREST and find the meaning of life?

PROJECT TRUNK is an eccentric platform shooter where you dodge or block bullets! Super tight controls and hancrafted levels.

Features (because who doesn't love a big list?):

  • Loads of enemies - from the lowly MONOBROWBUG, to the speedy BEAKBALLOON, to the terrifying MOUTHSTACK!
  • Loads of bullets - but don't worry, because you have a...
  • Shield - aim your shield to block bullets and reflect enemies with no sense of personal space! If an obstatcle can't be dodged, block it!
  • Story - the story of the TRUNKMAN's mission will unfold through cutscenes and comics
  • 25 levels
  • Orange peels!

Thanks for checking out my game page, I really do appreciate it :) - kadable

~
Game by Kade Hennessy
Idea for Platform Species by Rhys Hennessy
Playtesting by Ashton Hennessy and Rhys Hennessy
Made in pygame
